title: After the completion and submission of a SR-1 form, what is the criteria for determination whether a private dirt road can become a paved state road?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question.  http://www.myreporter.com/2012/07/how-do-we-turn-a-private-road-into-a-state-maintained-road/ Further questions can be directed to the phone number in that answer.
